description: This file defines a React functional component called Sidebar, which displays a list of notes with search filtering capabilities and a button to create new notes. It manages local search query state, filters notes based on user input, and renders child components for search input and individual note items.

methods.name: Sidebar({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onCreate })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a sidebar with a searchable list of notes, a create note button, and handles filtering of notes based on user input.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onCreate }) {$/
